GSD.description:
xen/blkfront: harden blkfront against event channel storms

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.168 by commit 4ed9f5c511ce95cb8db05ff82026ea901f45fd76. For more details please see the references link.
